item.title: Getting better feedback on your work
item.description: To receive constructive — and effective — feedback, we simply need to ask for it.
item.dc:creator: hellojames.co.uk

item.title: What the Ancient Egyptians teach us about iteration
item.description: Building software is continuous. When we start something, we know the least about what it is we need to do — only ever learning more as we progress. So why do we often decide what it will be in the end, at the beginning?
item.dc:creator: hellojames.co.uk

item.title: Continuous design and development
item.description: Recorded at OVO Product Development Conference 2019
item.dc:creator: hellojames.co.uk
